name: WP-Footnotes to YAFootnotes
author: Maris Svirksts

sections.description: Automatically changes footnote syntax from WP-Footnotes to YAFootnotes Plugin on the fly. One can change syntax permanently by going to “Settings->Change Footnotes”. This plugin is created for Darkmatter journal.
sections.installation:
1. Upload changeFootnotes.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. (optional): Go to “Settings->Change Footnotes” and, by clicking “Change Syntax”, change syntax permanently.
sections.faq:
Can I disable this plugin after changes are done?

Yes, after changing syntax permanently (“Settings->Change Footnotes”), you can disable this plugin as it doesn’t do anything else.

short_description: Automatically changes footnote syntax from WP-Footnotes to YAFootnotes Plugin.
